application

Class EHomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.EHomeController

  • public class EHomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses methods to give the employee access to all the functionalities required in this cinema booking system.
    Author:
    Federico Ziviani

    • Method Detail

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the parameter title equals to the instance variable title.
        Parameters:
        title - is the name of the string holding the value of the title.

      • fillCombo

        public void fillCombo()
        Fills the comboBox listing the movies available retrieving their titles from the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - cannot connect to database when the connection to the database fails. The list of movie can not be displayed.

      • comboChange

        public void comboChange(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Loads this next page when the user selects a movie title from the comboBox. The controller of the next page is called here to set its label to the value selected in the comboBox. Its TextArea to the movie description. Its ImageView to its image. And its comboBox is populated with values calling the method to fill this comboBox.
        Parameters:
        e - event that occurs when a value is selected in the comboBox.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - of an invalid fxml file when it tries to loads the page.

      • addMovie

        public void addMovie(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Loads this page where the employee can add a new movie.
        Parameters:
        e - event that occurs when this button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - of an invalid fxml file when it tries to loads the page.

      • exportProjections

        public void exportProjections(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Exports all projections information such as movie title, date, time, booked and available seats to a text file in this project.
        Parameters:
        e - event that occurs when this button is clicked.
        Throws:
        Input - Output Exceptions

      • addProjection

        public void addProjection(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Loads the page where the employee can add a new projection time and date for an existing movie title. Calling the controller of the page it is loading, fils its comboBox with the titles of the movies.
        Parameters:
        e - event that occurs when this button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - of an invalid fxml file when it tries to loads the page.

      • seeRatings

        public void seeRatings(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the page where all average ratings for the movies in the system are displayed. Calling the controller of the page it is loading and its method to populate the TableView with ratings.
        Parameters:
        e - event that occurs when this button is clicked.
        Throws:
        Input - Output Exception.
        java.io.IOException

      • logOut

        public void logOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Logs you out from the system.
        Parameters:
        e - event that occurs when this button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - of an invalid fxml file when it tries to loads the page.
